changeSet.sql: UPDATE thermal_temperature SET physical_context = CASE WHEN physical_context = '0' THEN 'ROOM' WHEN physical_context = '1' THEN 'INTAKE' WHEN physical_context = '2' THEN 'EXHAUST' WHEN physical_context = '3' THEN 'FRONT' WHEN physical_context = '4' THEN 'UPPER' WHEN physical_context = '5' THEN 'LOWER' WHEN physical_context = '6' THEN 'CPU' WHEN physical_context = '7' THEN 'GPU' WHEN physical_context = '8' THEN 'BACKPLANE' WHEN physical_context = '9' THEN 'SYSTEM_BOARD' WHEN physical_context = '10' THEN 'POWER_SUPPLY' WHEN physical_context = '11' THEN 'VOLTAGE_REGULATOR' WHEN physical_context = '12' THEN 'STORAGE_DEVICE' WHEN physical_context = '13' THEN 'NETWORKING_DEVICE' WHEN physical_context = '14' THEN 'COMPUTE_BAY' WHEN physical_context = '15' THEN 'STORAGE_BAY' WHEN physical_context = '16' THEN 'NETWORK_BAY' WHEN physical_context = '17' THEN 'EXPANSION_BAY' WHEN physical_context = '18' THEN 'POWER_SUPPLY_BAY' ELSE physical_context END
